author: "Bernard, de Gordon, approximately 1260-approximately 1318"
title: "Practica Gordonii. Praxis ... medicinae lilium nuncupata ... Item ejusdem ... tractatus acutarum egritudinum ... Item ejusdem tractatus de pronosticis ... Item ... tractatus de urinis ... Quae omnia ... apprime fuere recognita, cunctisque mendis et errori"
